Posts.Content: Aug 25, 2007 11:49PM Valeriex wrote: I have an appointment 3rd week of September. She said if it still hurts then we will look into this further. She reminded me that I complained of the same type of pain 1 year after diagnosis and we scanned it and it was nothing. Thanks for all of the support. Will let you know in the next several weeks.
Posts.Title: Hip/Leg Pain Valeriex wasblond

Posts.Content: Valeriex wrote: I have had hip/leg pain for about a month now. I did have a DEXA scan about 2 months ago. Would that reveal mets? Just like everyone, I HATE being worried about every pain. I was diagnosed stage 2B 4 years ago. ER/PR+, HER2-. I don't know how all of the fine women on this site deal with the day to day struggle of breast cancer and their everyday lives! Truly Incredible. Dx 5/15/2003, IDC, 2cm, Stage IIB, Grade 3, 2/14 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply

Posts.Content: Sep 18, 2007 02:53PM Valeriex wrote: I had an MRI of the hip and spine last week and my onc finally called with results.  I have a bone spur which they think is affecting a nerve and giving me weakness and pain in the left hip and thigh.  But no mets!  I still have the pain...It has been over 2 months.  I need to see ortho or neuro doctor to figure this out.  Thanks for all of the support!
